[애보트메디칼코리아] EP Field Clinical Engineer(Sales Rep)
text:
[애보트메디칼코리아] 
EP Field Clinical Engineer(Sales Rep)
한국애보트㈜는 자본금 309억 3,500만원, 매출액 2,088억 902만원, 사원수 261명 규모로 서울 강남구 대치동에 위치하고 있으며, 제약, 진단의학, 바스큘라, 당뇨사업을 하고 있습니다.
포지션 및 자격요건
Field Clinical Engineer
( ○명 )
ABOUT ABBOTT:
Abbott is a global healthcare leader, creating breakthrough science to improve people’s health. We’re always looking towards the future, anticipating changes in medical science and technology.
In Abbott’s Electrophysiology (EP) business, we’re advancing the treatment of heart disease through breakthrough medical technologies in atrial fibrillation, allowing people to restore their health and get on with their lives. 

KEY PURPOSE OF ROLE:
Intracardiac Echocardiography and EP case support and Sales 
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
Maintain up to date clinical and technical, relevant to assigned Division, of current and new ABT therapies and technologies as well as a general understanding of the dynamics of the country healthcare market.
Provide clinical support and assistance to the physicians with ABT equipment throughout the whole national territory
Act as back-up to Marketing and Sales Manager for the monitoring and correct reporting of product incidents in line with ABT standard procedures.
Provide operative support for product development programs when requested
Analyze the technical characteristics of competitors’ devices and contribute information to maintain the Marketing database
Promote assigned ABT product lines and assist with market penetration & development and the establishment of new accounts by providing technical and professional.
Conduct product presentations and perform stand duty at exhibitions when requested, responding to technical questions that might be raised by customer.
Provide training on the application of new products and clinical knowledge of intracardiac echocardiography and Electrophysiology to new physicians or other staffs as well
Achieves sales target
Collaborates with manager to implement agreed POA in line with marketing strategy
Identifies and establishes high quality customer relationships and internal collaboration
Works within agreed budgets
QUALIFICATIONS: 
Works systematically and logically to resolve problems, address opportunities or manage the situation at hand.
Develops and uses effective strategies to influence others or to gain their support.
Oral Communication / Presentation:  effectively transfers thoughts and express ideas verbally in individual or group situations internationally.
Planning and Organizing :  effectively identifies, plans, schedules and co-ordinates the resources (people, material, information, time) required to Accomplish your goals, is well prepared for every case ensuring they have the right stock and arrives on time.
Manages own commitments and time, works independently and autonomously across all accounts, completes administrative tasks (particularly the on line diary) accurately and in line with deadlines.
Establishing and maintaining a highly responsive relationship and effective communication with customers to ensure customer satisfaction.
Completion of knowing the electrophysiology inside out.
Completion of ABT product certification. Ensure all ABT standing Quality Procedures are followed and operate at all times in a way that maintains a positive perception of the ABT brand.
